item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the LH side and RH side.
The procedures listed below are for the LH side.

atten3.ptxt: Wash off brake fluid immediately if it comes in contact with any painted surface.

s2.ptxt: Using a union nut wrench, remove the brake tube from the flexible hose while holding the flexible hose with a wrench.

item.ptxt: Do not bend or damage the brake tube.
Do not allow any foreign matter such as dirt and dust to enter the brake tube from the connecting points.

s2.ptxt: Remove the clip labeled A and bolt labeled B.
Remove the union bolt labeled C, flexible hose and gasket.
